snippet: A paper published in Nature Communications details the 2006 discovery of the fossilized remains of a giant camel in Canada.
abstract: Natalia Rybczynski study in journal Nature Communications reports discovery of fossilized remains of giant camel in northern Canada.
lead_paragraph: A paper published in Nature Communications details the 2006 discovery of the fossilized remains of a giant camel in Canada.

headline.seo: Camel Fossil Found in Canada’s Arctic
headline.main: Canada’s North, Home to Bears, and Once, Camels
headline.print_headline: Canada’s North, Home to Bears, And Once, Camels
